name: Mega Trucker
description:
Pace yourself. It’s almost time to make that leap. Take a running jump, and… yes, you did it! This is Mega Trucker, and it is the most dangerous race you’ll ever undertake. Are you ready to try it out?

Grab your running shoes and catch that truck. In this race, you’ll leap between moving vehicle – gasp! – and race against the competitors until you reach the finish line. This is a high-stakes race like no other. Fall, and you lose it all.

So, let us ask you – are you ready for the thrill of Mega Trucker?
